_description: PERSISTENT LEARNING LOG — Read this at START of every session
_instructions: Add learnings when: verification fails, edge cases found, patterns discovered

learnings.lesson: Always read learnings.json first — will repeat mistakes otherwise
Complete stories in order (DT-001, DT-002, etc.)
Black and white ONLY — no other colors. Use CSS variables from CLAUDE.md
Always test at 375px viewport width — this is a mobile PWA
Always include: date, time, timezone (Asia/Singapore), day of week
Output must be professional and shareable without editing — follow templates exactly
Include entities and relationships for future AI agent use
PIN derives encryption key via PBKDF2 (100k iterations). Key never leaves device. Only encrypted blobs go to cloud. This is true E2E encryption.
Use Playfair Display (serif) for display text, Inter (sans) for body. Letter-spacing: 0.15em for brand. Keep it editorial and confident.
PIN.init() must run first in DOMContentLoaded. App modules only init after PIN.onUnlock(). This prevents access to unencrypted data.
